806280.name: Fantasy Grounds - Town and Village Map Pack by Joshua Watmough (Map Pack)
806280.description:
Town and Village Map Pack by Joshua Watmough

Designed for areas in size between regional and battle maps Town and Village Map Pack delivers a variety of locations for intermediate maps from classic fantasy woodland towns to jungle villages.
Hand drawn in the same style as my other map packs this will seamlessly transition from one scale to another for a complete and immersive experience.
This pack includes the following maps:
  • Forest Town
  • Walled Forest Town
  • Town with Docks
  • Town with River
  • Town in Winter
  • Town in Desert
  • Town on Islands
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Joshua Watmough
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
